description.value:
Trigger A creature enters one of the four alcoves

Effect The trap rolls initiative.

details.description: Arcs of primal energy emerge from the L-shaped stone wall at the center of each alcove.
details.disable:
@Check[type:crafting|dc:28] or @Check[type:thievery|dc:28] (expert) to rig up a dummy or other object to distract one of the trap's sensors, or @Check[type:nature|dc:26] (trained) to temporarily befuddle one of the sensors with knowledge of primal magic.

Alternatively, inserting the correct key into an alcove's keyhole disables that alcove's sensor.
details.reset: The trap is powered by the Eternal Bloom. It resets after 5 minutes, at which time the doors to the vault slam shut once again.
details.routine:
(4 actions) The trap loses one action per magical sensor disabled. On its initiative, the trap uses each of its actions to target one creature adjacent to or within an alcove with a negative effect that corresponds to the season opposite the one depicted on the alcove's murals (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] to resist). For the purposes of this trap, creatures who are within an alcove's landscape count are within that alcove. The trap can target only one creature per alcove per round.

Spring Alcove (death) The decay of late autumn takes hold of the target.

  • Critical Success The trap has no effect.
  • Success The target takes [[/r (2d6+2)[negative]]] damage.
  • Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[negative]]] damage.
  • Critical Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[negative]]] damage and [[/r 1d6[persistent,negative]]] damage. Effects that use positive energy, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell, automatically end this persistent damage.

Summer Alcove (cold) Winter's bitter chill descends on the target.

  • Critical Success The trap has no effect.
  • Success The target takes [[/r (2d6+2)[cold]]] damage.
  • Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[cold]]] damage.
  • Critical Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[cold]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour.

Autumn Alcove (poison) Poisonous springtime pollen sprays at the target.

  • Critical Success The trap has no effect.
  • Success The target takes [[/r (2d6+2)[poison]]] damage.
  • Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[poison]]] damage.
  • Critical Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[poison]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}.

Winter Alcove (fire) Heat greater than the hottest summer afternoon engulfs the target.

  • Critical Success The trap has no effect.
  • Success The target takes [[/r (2d6+2)[fire]]] damage.
  • Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[fire]]] damage.
  • Critical Failure The target takes [[/r (4d6+4)[fire]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 hour.

source.value: Pathfinder Society Scenario #1-16: The Perennial Crown Part 1, Opal of Bhopan
